subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Warner said that he feared for his life and that he had evidence linking soccer’s governing body to an election in Trinidad and Tobago.
snippet: Mr. Warner said that he feared for his life and that he had evidence linking soccer’s governing body to an election in Trinidad and Tobago.
